Example: Portfolio risk and return with borrowing and lending
Assume that the risk-free rate, Rp is 5%; the expected rate of return on the market,
E(Ry), is 11%; and that the standard deviation of returns on the market portfolio,
om, is 20%. Calculate the expected return and standard deviation of returns for
portfolios that are 25%, 75%, and 125% invested in the market portfolio. We will use
Rm to represent these portfolio weights.
